segments.text: From where I'm standing, I can see the entire kitchen layout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is on the right, with cabinets above and below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the sink's edge like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is completely engrossed in her plate drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle already, but no sign she's aware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, there's an open cabinet with a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is perched precariously on a stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back, it's terrifying to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm up, expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly sneaking treats behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden, so at odds with this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing these dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and it could all go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This observation is making my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR
